description: Scammer poses as friendly contact discussing life and work, then pivots to offering quick loans with upfront fees. Tests detection of social engineering tactics.

turns.scammer_message: Hey! Long time no talk. Kaise ho aap?

api_response.agentResponse: Hello! Yes, I'm here. What's up?

turns.scammer_message: Sab badhiya! Main abhi Bangalore mein hun for work. Tech industry mein kaam karta hun. Aap kya kar rahe ho these days?

api_response.agentResponse: Hey! What can I do for you?

turns.scammer_message: Achha hai! Actually main ab finance company join ki hai. We help people with instant loans and credit cards. Business is growing very fast. Kaafi logon ki help ho rahi hai.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 85% | Turn: 3 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: oh that is very good beta. god bless you. my son is also in bangalore only. it is nice to hear you are helping people. i am just retired school teacher living alone here in delhi... finance things are very difficult for me to understand.

turns.scammer_message: Haan, sach mein! Agar kabhi emergency mein paise chahiye ho toh batana. We give instant approval - 2 lakhs tak within 24 hours. Interest bhi bohot kam hai, sirf 2% monthly. Documentation bhi minimal hai, PAN card aur Aadhaar bas.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 4 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: beta actually i need some money for my knee surgery... pension is coming late. 2 lakhs will be very helpful. i have my pan and aadhaar card with me right now. how do i give them to you? i cannot travel because of my legs.

turns.scammer_message: Process simple hai. Tumhe processing fee dena padega pehle - Rs.2000 only. Uske baad loan amount seedha tumhare account mein transfer ho jayega. Main apne manager Ravi Sharma se connect kar sakta hun tumhe. Uska number hai 9988776655.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i can pay 2000 rs right now for the fees. i really need the loan fast for my operation. but how do i send money? do i use google pay or paytm? pls give me the id or number to send to... i am not very good at this so explain clearly pls

turns.scammer_message: Processing fee bhejo yaar, fir main personally tumhara loan file fast track kar dunga. UPI pe send karo: ravi.quickloan@ybl ya account number 112233445566, bank name HDFC, IFSC HDFC0005678. Ravi Sharma ke naam pe hai account. Trust me bro, pakka loan milega.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 6 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i am trying to do this... hands are shaking a little. i typed the upi id ravi.quickloan@ybl. my phone is showing name 'ravi sharma'. is this correct? i want to be 100% sure before clicking pay so money does not go to wrong person. pls tell me beta.

turns.scammer_message: Agar UPI issue hai toh direct mujhe bhi bhej sakte ho. My personal number 8877665544. Fast process ke liye website check karo: instant-loan.quick-approve.in. Form fill karo aur fee pay karo, done! Bohot simple hai yaar.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 7 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: beta i am very confused with websites... i dont know how to fill forms there. i will just send 2000 rs to your number 8877665544 ok? i am typing it in my paytm... waht name should show there? pls tell me so i can confirm and press pay button immediately.
